key_items_data.name: withered bouquet
key_items_data.description: Someone put heart and soul into making this.
key_items_data.use: Combined with Flint to make fire.

key_items_data.name: flint
key_items_data.description: Used to start fires.
key_items_data.use: Combined with Withered Bouquet to make fire.

key_items_data.name: cloudy mirror
key_items_data.description: The surface is dark and clouded.
key_items_data.use: Can be upgraded into the Celestial Mirror.

key_items_data.name: celestial mirror
key_items_data.description: The surface is shiny and bright.
key_items_data.use: Used in order to upgrade Celestial Weapons.

key_items_data.name: summoners soul
key_items_data.description: Allows the aeons to learn abilities.
key_items_data.use: Used in order to teach aeons abilities.

key_items_data.name: aeons soul
key_items_data.description: Allows you to raise aeon's attributes.
key_items_data.use: Used in order to increase an aeon's stats.

key_items_data.name: rusty sword
key_items_data.description: An old, rusty sword.
key_items_data.use: Required to obtain Masamune.

key_items_data.name: mark of conquest
key_items_data.description: Distinguish a powerful fighter.
key_items_data.use: Proof that the player has defeated Nemesis.

key_items_data.name: blossom crown
key_items_data.description: Seems to have a connection with a hidden aeon...
key_items_data.use: Breaks part of the seal to the Chamber of the Fayth at Remiem Temple.

key_items_data.name: flower sceptre
key_items_data.description: Seems to have a connection with a hidden aeon...
key_items_data.use: Breaks part of the seal to the Chamber of the Fayth at Remiem Temple.

key_items_data.name: sun crest
key_items_data.description: A celestial token, fashioned in the shape of the Sun.
key_items_data.use: Used in conjunction with the Celestial Mirror to upgrade the Caladbolg.

key_items_data.name: sun sigil
key_items_data.description: A celestial token, fashioned in the shape of the Sun.
key_items_data.use: Used in conjunction with the Celestial Mirror to upgrade the Caladbolg.

key_items_data.use: Used in conjunction with the Celestial Mirror to upgrade the Nirvana.

key_items_data.use: Used in conjunction with the Celestial Mirror to upgrade the Nirvana.

key_items_data.name: al bhed primer i
key_items_data.description: Teaches the letter 'A' in Al Bhed.
key_items_data.use: The Al Bhed letter 'A' is replaced with the English letter 'E' in Al Bhed subtitles and text.

key_items_data.description: Teaches the letter 'B' in Al Bhed.
